name: assemblyfunction
title: json result file for an assembly function

status.description: indication if data gathering was successful

content.name: assemblyfunction
content.title: assembly function
content.description: Collection of basic blocks that make up a function

name.description: (optional) name of the function from symbol information or user-provided

faddr.description: hexaddress of function entry point. Note that this address is not necessarily the lowest address of the function.

md5hash.description: md5 hash of the hex-encoded bytes of the function instructions

basicblocks.description: list of basic blocks included in the function

assemblyblock.name: assemblyblock
assemblyblock.title: assembly block
assemblyblock.description: Range of instructions within a function that form a basic block

startaddr.description: hexaddress of the first instruction of the block

endaddr.description: hexaddress of the (syntactically) last instruction of the block. Note that this would be the address of the delay slot for a MIPS assembly block, which is not the last instruction to be executed

instructions.description: list of assembly instructions contained in the block

assemblyinstruction.name: assemblyinstruction
assemblyinstruction.title: assembly instruction
assemblyinstruction.description: Single assembly instruction at a given address within a function annotated with analysis information

addr.description: list of context addresses within the function instruction address last

bytes.description: hexadecimal representation of the instruction bytes

opcode.description: standard assembly instruction representation, possibly broken in opcode part and operands part for better formatting

annotation.description: representation of instruction semantics using invariants

stackpointeroffset.name: stackpointeroffset
stackpointeroffset.title: stackpointer offset
stackpointeroffset.description: value or range of values of the stack pointer relative to the value at the function entry, as determined by the analysis, or unknown

oneOf.description: closed interval specified by minimum and maximum value
right open interval specified by lower bound

oneOf.descripotion: left open interval specified by upper bound
